Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards hit a go-ahead 7-foot floater with 25.7 seconds left, and Rudy Gobert iced the game with two free throws to lead the Minnesota Timberwolves past the Denver Nuggets 119-116 on Friday night.
Post-Match Reflections: The lack of depth is a concern for the Nuggets, whose bench was outscored 31-13.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jamal Murray was lost to the concussion protocol in the third quarter after colliding with Julius Randle.
Gordon led the Nuggets with 31 points and 11 rebounds in a rematch of last season's Western Conference semifinal.
Others: The Timberwolves had 22 fast-break points, and their bench was outscored 31-13 by the Nuggets' bench.
